fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: LL follows mainly European Union transport and traffic policy and other policies covering especially road transport market.
organisation_name: Association of Locistic Enterprises in Finland (LL)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: LL is member of Confederation of Finnish Industries (EK)
goals__remit:
Association of Logistic Enterprises in Finland - LL members are the largest logistics services providers in Finland, linked by logistics and the employers' position. The member companies' lines of business include: transportation systems, terminal and storage activities, as well as logistics systems, mainly in the home country. We have 25 members. Our members a total turnover is over 1.4 billion. EUR, which is a quarter of Finland's road transport turnover. 
 
The main tasks of the Association are:  
1. Improve conditions for members operating in the transport and logistics business  
2. Promote the solutions of employees and subcontractors resources   
3. Promote the competitiveness of in the logistics sector  
 
Associations strategy and mission can be simplified as follows: "Logistics Business Association's members are key players in the field, who co-create and develop best practices in a global supply chain management. Logistics task is the business development of competitiveness and therefore we are looking for solutions and business models that contribute to our customers' competitiveness
